c-1: ^Thach Sanh: I'm sorry! I should've came sooner!

g-4: ^Thach Sanh: I'm Thach Sanh. A villager saw me on the way and ask me to help the village!
g-5: ^Villager: No, you can't! Everyone's dead!... I thought that we could fight back!
g-6: ^Villager: But a giant tiger show up, it killed everyone that it can find! We can't do anything against that such a power!
g-7: ^Thach Sanh: Maybe someone is still alive! I can save them if I get to him!
^Villager: No, you can't. You're going to get yourself killed!

c-0: ^Thach Sanh: Maybe! But I can't just run away!
c-1: ^Thach Sanh: I'm not afraid of danger.
g-1: ^Thach Sanh: Be safe! We may meet again!
